events.message: The candidate has submitted their application for the software engineer position through our careers portal, including their resume and cover letter highlighting relevant experience.
Recruitment team reviewed the new application and categorised it under the Engineering department because the candidate's experience revolves around software development.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles was assigned to manage this candidate's hiring process and coordinate the next steps.
The recruiter conducted an initial phone screening to assess the candidate's technical background, communication skills, and cultural fit for the software engineering team.
The candidate promptly responded to the interview invitation, expressing enthusiasm for the opportunity and confirming availability for a technical interview.
The technical interview with the senior engineering team has been scheduled for next week to evaluate coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
